bookings.special_requests: One guest is vegetarian - can we have an alternative?
bookings.provider_response: Of course! I'll prepare a special vegetarian version with local vegetables. Looking forward to meeting you both!

review.comment: This was the highlight of our trip to Mérida! María is not just an amazing cook, but a wonderful storyteller. We learned so much about Yucatecan culture while preparing the cochinita pibil. The market tour was fascinating, and the final meal was delicious. My vegetarian friend loved her special dish. Highly recommend!

bookings.special_requests: I'm interested in the Mayan history of the cenotes. Can we discuss that during the tour?
bookings.provider_response: Absolutely! The sacred cenote is perfect for this. I'll share the stories my grandfather told me. See you soon!

review.comment: As a history teacher, I was blown away by Carlos's knowledge of Mayan culture and the sacred significance of cenotes. The bike ride was beautiful, the cenotes were pristine (no crowds!), and the lunch at the local family's home was authentic. This is exactly the kind of experience I was hoping for. Carlos is a true professional and guardian of his culture.

bookings.experience_title: Street Food Tour: Tacos, Marquesitas & More
bookings.special_requests: I'm a food photographer - is it okay to take photos at all the stops?
bookings.provider_response: Perfect! I love photographers! I'll introduce you to the vendors and make sure you get great shots. Can't wait!

bookings.experience_title: Sunset at Uxmal with Local Archaeologist
bookings.special_requests: Can we discuss recent archaeological discoveries at Uxmal?
bookings.provider_response: That's my favorite topic! I'll show you some areas where we're still finding new things. It will be a special tour.

review.comment: Extraordinary experience! Dr. Caamal's expertise is incredible. He didn't just recite facts - he brought the ancient Maya to life. Watching sunset from the Pyramid of the Magician with an archaeologist explaining the astronomical alignments was unforgettable. Worth every penny. This is how archaeological sites should be experienced.

bookings.special_requests: Somos familia con dos niños (8 y 11 años). ¿Es adecuado para ellos?
bookings.provider_response: ¡Perfecto para niños! Los flamencos les van a encantar. Tengo chalecos salvavidas de todos los tamaños. ¡Nos vemos pronto!

bookings.special_requests: I'm doing research on food traditions and cultural preservation. Would love to discuss this during the class.
bookings.provider_response: How wonderful! This is exactly why I teach - to preserve our traditions. We'll have plenty of time to talk. Welcome!

bookings.experience_title: Mayan Embroidery Workshop with Artisan Women
bookings.special_requests: I'm studying indigenous women's economic empowerment. Can we discuss the cooperative's impact?
bookings.provider_response: Yes! The cooperative changed our lives. I'd be happy to share our story. See you soon.

bookings.experience_title: Beekeeping & Honey Tasting with Melipona Bees
bookings.special_requests: We're interested in sustainability and conservation. Looking forward to learning!
bookings.provider_response: You'll love it! The bees are fascinating and the honey is delicious. I'll explain everything about conservation.

bookings.experience_title: Street Food Tour: Tacos, Marquesitas & More
bookings.special_requests: Somos de CDMX y creemos que conocemos la comida mexicana... ¡sorpréndenos!
bookings.provider_response: ¡Jaja! La comida yucateca es completamente diferente. Van a descubrir sabores nuevos. ¡Prepárense!

review.comment: Ale tenía razón - la comida yucateca es otro mundo! Los panuchos, salbutes, y especialmente las marquesitas nos volaron la cabeza. Los lugares que visitamos eran 100% locales, nada turístico. Como chilango, pensaba que conocía toda la comida mexicana, pero esto fue una revelación. ¡Imperdible!

bookings.special_requests: I'd love to photograph the workshop and the weaving process for my blog. Is that okay?
bookings.provider_response: Of course! I'm happy to have you document the craft. Maybe it will inspire others to appreciate hammocks.

most_popular_experience.title: Street Food Tour: Tacos, Marquesitas & More
